ComicInfo.Summary:
Ouija Board
The veil between our world and the next is so paper thin that even the slightest tear can open the floodgates. Two couples are about to find out that contacting the other side could lead to disastrous and even deadly results.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Eric J & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Daniel Leister & Vinicius Andrade | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia DiNapoli | 3 | D | Emerald City Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Sabine Rich | Missing | E | Emerald City Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Sabine Rich | Missing | F | C2E2 Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Paul Green (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing |
